name: Ladybug
description:
Ladybug is a plugin for weather data and environmental analysis.

See release notes at discourse.ladybug.tools
contents:
Analysis Period - Analysis Period.
-, Calculate HOY - Calculate hour of the year.
-, Color Range - Use this component to access a library of typical gradients useful throughout Ladybug. 
The output from this component should be plugged into the colors_ input of the
"Legend Parameters" component.
For an image of each of the gardients in the library, check here:
https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/gradients.jpg
-, Construct Location - Construct location.
-, Deconstruct Location - Deconstruct location.
-, Generate Colors - Use this component to generate colors based on values and legend parameters.
-, Import EPW - Import epw.
-, Import Location - Import location.
-, Legend Parameters - Use this component to change the colors, numerical range, and/or number of divisions
of any Ladybug legend along with the corresponding colored mesh that the legend refers to.
Any Ladybug component that outputs a colored mesh and a legend will have an input
that can accept Legend Parameters from this component.
This component particularly helpful in making the colors of Ladybug graphics consistent
for a presentation or for synchonizing the numerical range and colors between Ladybug graphics.
-, SunPath - Use this component to make a 3D sun-path (aka. sun plot).
The component also outputs sun vectors that can be used for solar access
analysis or shading design.
-
